meanings.definition: A person lacking sophistication or refinement.
meanings.sent1: The chawbacon at the party stood out with their loud jokes and messy eating habits.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a chawbacon and slurp your soup at the fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The chawbacon tried to impress everyone by talking about their collection of plastic forks.
meanings.sent4: In a world of elegance, he was a chawbacon, sticking out like a sore thumb.
meanings.sent5: The image of the chawbacon in a tuxedo was hard to forget.

meanings.definition: To chew or gnaw on something.
meanings.sent1: The puppy loves to chawbacon on his favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: Please don't chawbacon on your pencil during the exam.
meanings.sent3: She chawbaconed on the gum so loudly, it echoed in the room.
meanings.sent4: The old house seemed to chawbacon on the memories of its past.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the squirrel chawbaconing on the nut was surprisingly loud.
